lead_paragraph: The girl, 7, and her mother, Fatemah, posted an open letter to President Trump on Bana’s Twitter account, sharing the message with the hundreds of thousands of users who follow the account.
snippet: The girl, 7, and her mother, Fatemah, posted an open letter to President Trump on Bana’s Twitter account, sharing the message with the hundreds of thousands of users who follow the account....

headline.main: Bana al-Abed Writes Trump: ‘Please Save the Children and People of Syria’
